plugins.name: Data Table Builder Pro
plugins.description:
Data Table Builder Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you quickly create, customize, and save reusable table designs.


Build Data Tables Fast

Add multiple columns with different data types (text, number, boolean, ratings, labels, avatars, and more) so you can shape your table exactly how you need it.


Visual Table Builder

Edit columns in a live preview with inline editing. Easily tweak styling, spacing, borders, and more.


Theming & Auto-layout Controls

Choose from Shadcn themes and customize any element color to suit your brand or design and as row or column based auto layout.


CSV Import

Quickly populate large tables by importing CSV data. Perfect for teams handling data from spreadsheets.


Save & Reuse Templates

Save your tables—complete with styling and layout—to reuse next time. You can store unlimited custom templates and iterate on them over time.


Clearly Named Layers

Export your table into Figma file as ready-to-use auto-layout frames with easy to understand layer names.


Why Use Data Table Builder Pro?


Time-Saving

Create data-dense mockups fast without manually creating rows and columns.


Consistent Designs

Ensure your tables maintain a polished look across multiple projects thanks to reusable templates.


Flexible & Customizable

Tailor column types, theme colors, and layout directions to fit your exact needs.


Collaborative

Import real data from CSV for realistic scenarios or stakeholder presentations.


Give your data the presentation it deserves and level up your Figma projects with Table Templates Pro!


Free trial limitations:

  1. 3 table exports
  2. No saved tables

accepted.name: Superbig
accepted.description: 👋 Hey there! My name is Chris and I'm a product designer who the builds plugins I want to use.

plugins.tagline: Create, customize, and save reusable data tables with CSV data or easy to edit templates.

plugins.name: Sparkle Design Theme Settings
plugins.description:
Sparkle Designに興味はあるけど、自分のプロジェクトに合うだろうか...そんな不安を抱えていませんか？

Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの利用者が更にいいデザインを生み出すことをサポートするプラグインです。


Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Designの高い品質を維持しながらも複雑なVariablesの編集や面倒なドキュメントの更新を自動で実行するため、Sparkle Designを簡単に任意のスタイルにカスタマイズできます。


現在は以下の3つのテーマのカスタマイズに対応しています。


Primary Color

プライマリカラーを好みの色に設定できます。グレーもプライマリカラーを反映した配色が自動で反映されるため、UI全体のトーンを維持しながらのカスタマイズが可能です！


Font Family

monospaceとproportionalのそれぞれのフォントファミリーを設定できます。対応フォントはすべてGoogle Fontsに収録されているため、開発時もスムーズな連携が可能です。


Border Radius

角丸のサイズを設定できます。UIの要素ごとに異なるサイズの角丸がすべて同期的に変化するため、それぞれの角丸が持つ意味を残しながらもUIの印象を変更できます。


※ Sparkle Design Theme SettingsはSparkle Design専用のプラグインです。Sparkle Design上でご利用ください。


Sparkle Designについて

  1. https://sparkle-design.goodpatch.com/
  2. Sparkle Design for Figma


グッドパッチについて

グッドパッチは顧客体験を起点に企業変革を前進させるデザインカンパニーです。

https://goodpatch.com/

accepted.name: Sparkle Design
accepted.description: グッドパッチのナレッジを集約。誰もがいいデザインを生み出せるグッドパッチのデザインシステム「Sparkle Design」です。

plugins.tagline: Sparkle Designのテーマ編集ツール

plugins.name: Google Sheets & EasyContent Sync
plugins.description:
Tired of using “Lorem Ipsum” and generic images and then realizing that the text doesn’t fit or the image aspect ratio is different? Why not use your REAL content?


NEW: Introduced free Figma - Google Sheets integration


Watch the overview video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uuEsBKcnNp8


Say goodbye to placeholder text and Lorem Ipsum! The EasyContent plugin bridges the gap between your content and your design team by bringing your actual website content directly into Figma. Enhance your workflow, improve collaboration, and create designs that truly reflect the final product.


Why Use the EasyContent Plugin?

Designing with fake content can lead to broken experiences and costly revisions. With EasyContent, you can:

  1. Enhance Collaboration: Align your design and content teams by working with real content.
  2. Improve UX: Stress-test your designs with actual content to ensure they work in all scenarios.
  3. Impress Stakeholders: Present realistic mockups that accurately reflect the final product.


Key Features

  1. Direct Integration with EasyContent.io: Securely connect your EasyContent projects to Figma.
  2. Drag and Drop Content Fields: Easily insert text and images from your content projects into your designs.
  3. Content Swapping: Swap between different content items to test layouts and stress-test designs.
  4. Real-Time Updates: Keep your designs up-to-date with the latest content from your projects.
  5. Support for Text and Images: Currently supports single-line text, multi-line text, rich text, and images.


Who Is This Plugin For?

  1. Marketing and Web Design Agencies: Streamline your workflow by integrating content and design tools.
  2. Design Teams: Collaborate effectively with content creators and ensure designs are content-ready.
  3. Content Creators: Visualize how content will appear in the final design and provide feedback.


Getting Started

  1. Install the Plugin: Download the EasyContent plugin from the Figma Marketplace.
  2. Connect Your Account: Enter your EasyContent API key to securely connect your projects. If you don’t have an account, create it here: https://easycontent.io/
  3. Select a Project and Template: Choose the content you want to work with.
  4. Drag and Drop Content: Insert content fields directly into your design.


Future Developments

We're continuously improving the EasyContent plugin. Upcoming features include support for additional content types like checkboxes, radio buttons, selects, and dates.


Need Help or Have Suggestions?

We're here to support you. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@easycontent.io.


Transform Your Design Process Today

Elevate your designs by integrating real content directly from EasyContent. Install the EasyContent plugin now and experience a more efficient, collaborative, and realistic design process!
plugins.tagline: Design with real content, not placeholders. Bridge the gap between your content and design teams!

plugins.name: Text node name to id
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

7903.name: Text node name to id
7903.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

plugins.name: JSON to Text Fill
plugins.description:
Imagine you need to create a table with 10 rows and 10 columns. What if, instead of manually replacing text for 100 layers, you could use ChatGPT to generate random, "real life" looking data and use our plugin to fill all selected text layers with the newly generated text?


Imagine no more. Simply generate your JSOn using ChatGPT (see prompt examples here), select the text layers you want to replace in Figma, and fire up our plugin.


Current limitations:


  1. Layers will be filled according to Figma layering. If you don't get the right order, try re-ordering the Figma layers and repeat the process.
  2. Comma-separated values and complex JSON structured currently not accepted
plugins.tagline: Replace text layers with any text content in JSON format

85276.name: JSON to Text Fill
85276.description:
Imagine you need to create a table with 10 rows and 10 columns. What if, instead of manually replacing text for 100 layers, you could use ChatGPT to generate random, "real life" looking data and use our plugin to fill all selected text layers with the newly generated text?


Imagine no more. Simply generate your JSOn using ChatGPT (see prompt examples here), select the text layers you want to replace in Figma, and fire up our plugin.


Current limitations:


  1. Layers will be filled according to Figma layering. If you don't get the right order, try re-ordering the Figma layers and repeat the process.
  2. Comma-separated values and complex JSON structured currently not accepted
85276.release_notes:
- Added shortcut to submit the form (Cmd / Ctrl + Enter )
- Hidden examples under a button
85276.tagline: Replace text layers with any text content in JSON format

plugins.name: Styles cloner
plugins.description:
If you need to reuse local styles from one file to another, Styles clone is here to help!


Whether you start new project or continue iterating on existing one, now you can easily update your local styles library with new tailored items.

Plugin supports all style types with unlimited nesting levels:

  1. 🔤 Text styles
  2. 🎨 Color styles
  3. 🥅 Grid styles
  4. 🖌️ Effect styles


How it works?

  1. Open Style cloner plugin in one Figma Design file
  2. Copy Styles to clipboard with the button in Get Styles section
  3. Open Style cloner in Design file you are working with
  4. Paste config in Paste styles section and click Paste button
  5. You're all set! 🕺


For those who want to a clean slate, use Delete styles option. It is self explanatory and works with no surprises.


This is not my first plugin so I pay attention to errors handling. You will be notified if something goes wrong with Figma's native toasts. Control and comfort is the first priority. Stay tuned for future updates.


If you like plugin please click like, save and leave a comment! Appreciate it!

Support: kolebaev.build@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Copy text, color, effetc and grid styles between files in a blink of an eye

plugins.name: CSS Variable exporter
plugins.description: CSS Variable Exporter is a plugin designed to seamlessly export design tokens and variables from your Figma projects into a CSS-compatible format. This facilitates a smooth integration between design systems and development environments by allowing designers and developers to maintain interface consistency through shared styling standards.
plugins.tagline: Variable Exporter is a plugin that efficiently transforms Figma design tokens and variables into CSS

133672.tagline: Variable Exporter is a plugin that efficiently transforms Figma design tokens and variables into CSS

plugins.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
plugins.description:
Dotsss is a powerful annotation tool designed to streamline competitor research, benchmarking, and design collaboration. With auto-numbered dots that dynamically reorder when added or removed, you can maintain clarity in feedback, specs, and moodboards.


Key Features:

✅ Groups: Create separate dot groups per page or project—each with its own numbering sequence, color, size, and custom name.

✅ Dynamic Numbering: Add or remove dots in any group, and watch numbers auto-update instantly.

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.
plugins.tagline: Annotate with smart dots that reorder as you edit. Organize by group, color, or project. 🎨🔢

123550.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
123550.description:

✅ Dynamic Numbering: Add or remove dots in any group, and watch numbers auto-update instantly.

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.
123550.tagline: Annotate with smart dots that reorder as you edit. Organize by group, color, or project. 🎨🔢

plugins.name: copy rotation
plugins.description:
A simple yet powerful rotation copy tool that helps you create precise circular array patterns. With intuitive drag-and-drop operations, you can preview and adjust rotation angle, count, and distance in real-time.


Key Features:

• Live Preview: Drag to see rotation effect instantly

• Precise Control: Customize rotation angle, copy count, and spacing

• Smart Scaling: Automatically adapts to different layer sizes

• All Layer Types: Works with shapes, groups, frames, and more

• Original Layer Preserved: Creates copies without affecting the original


Use Cases:

• Clock face markers

• Radial patterns

• Rotating menus

• Circular layouts
plugins.tagline: Create rotated copies of any element, adjust by dragging.

plugins.name: Color Harmony
plugins.description:
Explore the perfect color combinations. Pick the first hex code, and find other pleasing colors on the color wheel.


Color Harmonies

  1. Analogous
  2. Complementary
  3. Split Complementary
  4. Triadic
  5. Tetradic
  6. Compound
  7. Square


Color Variations

  1. Shades
  2. Tints
  3. Monochromatic
  4. Tones
  5. Hues


Features

  1. Select an object in your Figma project to load its color.
  2. Press "Update" to set it as the Current Color.
  3. Hover over the result colors to view their hex codes, and click to copy a color.
  4. In Settings, enable "Click color to fill" to fill the selected object with a result color.
plugins.tagline: Explore Harmonious Colors and Variations on the color wheel.

plugins.name: cmd-fill
plugins.description:
cmd your workflow

cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow.


The aim of this plugin is to save you time by surfacing those super-common, mouse-driven tasks - and provide access to them via the plugin menu.


Using your favorite keyboard shortcut or macro tool, assign any of these actions as shortcuts for the ultimate productivity boost.


cmd-fill features

Along with basic features around adding and removing fills, strokes, effects, and export settings, cmd-fill empowers you with features like:

  • Gradient mirroring and directionality (including 45° angles)
  • Image scale mode control (Fill, Fit, Crop, Tile)
  • Copy color values across color modes (CSS, RGB, HSL, HSB)
  • Directly apply strokes to specific edges
  • Invert colors (including linear gradients)
  • Flatten layer fills to create a single new hex value
  • Dynamic black & white color (changes based on background)
  • Invisible-yet-selectable hitbox fill


Check out more on each feature below, along with conditions to help you know how they can be used. cmd-fill has fairly robust error notifications, which should help direct you to issues and how to work through them.


---

features & conditions


Add Fill

Add a white, black, gradient, image, dynamic black, or hitbox fill to selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Gradient will pick up any current fill colors, if any
  • Dynamic fill changes between black and white depending on it’s background color
  • Hitbox is invisible, but allows you to select the layer using cmd + click


Remove Fill

Remove all fills from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Invert Fill Color

Inverts the fill color, where light becomes dark and vice versa and colors change to their compliment.

  • Use on one or more layers with a single fill
  • Supports linear gradients with transparent or opaque stops


Flatten Fill Color

Replaces two fills with a single fill using the flattened hex value of the previous two fills.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Works on linear gradients if all stops are fully opaque


Copy Fill Value

Copy the specified color mode value of a layer to the clipboard.

  • Use on a single layer with a single fill


Copy Flattened Hex

Copies the flattened hex value of the previous two fills to the clipboard, retaining the current fills of the layer.

  • Use on a single layer
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Does not support gradients


Mirror Gradient

Reversed the gradient color stops.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one gradient fill


Gradient Orientation

Orient gradients in any direction you choose.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one fill


Image Mode

Change the image scale mode for selected images.

  • Use on one or more layers with an image fill


Add Stroke

Add black or dynamic stroke to all or specified edges of selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Replaces existing stroke color and weight


Modify Stroke

Applies the stroke to the specified edges or alignment positions.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Maintains existing stroke color and weight


Remove Stokes

Remove all strokes from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Effects

Apply effects to selected layers, adding to any existing effects.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Export

Apply export settings to selected layers, replacing any existing settings.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • iOS & Android will add multiple export scales according to platform


Notes

cmd + fill will ignore and in many cases remove fills which have been set to hidden

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow!

plugins.name: Absolutely
plugins.description:
This plugin was created to assign keyboard shortcuts to access the absolute positioning property - nothing more. This function is native to Figma and Figma Slides.


To use the plugin, select layer(s) and run your command (Toggle, Apply, Remove).


Note: Absolute position can only be applied to children of auto layout frames.


Setup a shortcut: I use BetterTouchTool to manage my keyboard shortcuts.


Here is an example, since it's very unintuitive:

Keyboard Shortcut > Trigger Menu Bar Menu-Item > Plugins;Saved plugins;Absolutely;Apply


Enjoy!

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Control absolute positioning with a plugin!

plugins.name: Gradient Magic
plugins.description:
Gradient Magic helps you enhance your designs by refining gradient transitions with ease. Simply select a layer, and Gradient Magic ensures smooth and visually appealing gradients. Say goodbye to harsh color shifts and enjoy seamless transitions. Whether you’re perfecting a landing page, building a complex design system, or crafting mobile UI, Gradient Magic makes your gradients look polished with minimal effort.


Since each time the plugin runs, it consumes my API requests, if you find this tool useful and would like to support further development, feel free to contribute to my cryptocurrency wallet:

plugins.name: Click Depth
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for creating captivating layered patterns with depth.

Key features:


Seamless Figma integration: Works directly within your Figma designs

Shape library: Access circles, squares, triangles, and custom polygons

Layer stacking: Build complex patterns with up to 10+ customizable layers

Depth control: Adjust layer count and spacing for varied depth effects

Color picker integration: Use Figma's color tools for precise gradients

Transform options: Resize, rotate, and position shapes within Figma's interface

Blending mode support: Utilize Figma's blending capabilities between layers

Vector output: Generate scalable vector patterns for any project size


Enhance your Figma designs with:


Hypnotic backgrounds for UI/UX projects

Unique illustrations and abstract art

Eye-catching logo elements and brand visuals

Custom UI components with depth


Ideal for UI/UX designers, graphic artists, and Figma enthusiasts looking to add dimension and visual interest to their projects quickly and easily."

plugins.name: Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Tokens
plugins.description:
Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Token


A powerful Figma plugin to help you find and manage unlinked design tokens and styles across your files. Inspired from other plugins like Similayer / Token studio


🔍 Scan all unlinked values

- Typography: Find text layers missing text style variables

- Spacing: Detect auto-layout frames with unlinked spacing

- Corner Radius: Identify shapes with unlinked corner radius

- Fill Colors: Find layers with unlinked fill colors

- Stroke Colors: Detect layers with unlinked stroke colors


🎯 Smart Selection

  1. Scan entire page or selected frames/components
  2. Group similar unlinked values for easy selection
  3. Quick selection of affected layers
  4. Navigate to specific instances


Working with Results

  1. Results are grouped by type and value for easier management
  2. Click on any result to select the affected layers in your design
  3. Replace and update missing tokens and links!
  4. Use the navigation arrows to jump between instances
  5. Apply suggested styles directly from the results panel


Tips

  1. Use the grouped results to quickly standardize similar unlinked values
  2. Regular scanning helps maintain design system consistency
  3. Consider scanning before sharing designs or creating documentation

accepted.name: Ivan Yeo
accepted.description: Design system | Product designer | Badminton Lover

plugins.tagline: Scan and replace unlinked values

manifest.name: Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Tokens

136762.release_notes:
Stable V2.0.2

- Improved and add new options to select what you want to scan for. 
- Added Layout selection
- Added Opacity selection
- Added Effects selection
- Removed Live mode

BETA in V2.0.2
- You can now scan to pickup tokens and variables that are deleted from the file. select the scans and replace them with your new tokens!

Known Issues
- Deleted Variables would not filter font/typography tokens properly and some font tokens will sit under "others"
- No results showing when selecting a frame. Consider selection the nest frame of the screen you want to scan for.

Thank you for supporting! Feel free to give me feedback to improve on this plugin.

plugins.name: XAMLIFY
plugins.description:
Keep your design files clean and optimized with this dual-purpose plugin. Automatically remove all invisible elements that clutter your workspace. Plus, quickly flatten your icons into simplified shapes, making them ready for export and implementation.


Key features:


One-click cleanup of all invisible elements

Bulk icon flattening for consistent results

Quickly detach all visible instances on the page with a single action

Maintain your file structure while reducing complexity

Perfect for design system maintenance and file optimization, this plugin saves time by eliminating tedious manual tasks. Whether you're a UI designer, a design system manager, or anyone aiming to keep their Figma files efficient and well-organized, it's the ultimate tool for maintaining clean and streamlined projects.
plugins.tagline: Clean, Flatten & Detach: Remove invisible layers, simplify icons, and detach instances in one click.

plugins.name: FlatMagic
plugins.description:
FlatMagic is a sleek and efficient Figma plugin that transforms complex frame structures into single, flattened images with just one click. Perfect for designers who need to simplify their workflows, create thumbnails, or preserve the exact appearance of their designs.


Key Features:

• One-Click Flattening: Transform any frame or group into a single image instantly

• Smart Selection: The plugin intelligently enables only when a frame or group is selected

• Original Positioning: Maintains exact position and dimensions of your original frame

• Clean Interface: Modern, minimal UI that follows Figma's design patterns

• Resource Efficient: Reduces file size by converting complex layer structures into single images


Use Cases:

• Creating thumbnails for design systems

• Preserving complex effects and interactions

• Simplifying handoff deliverables

• Reducing file size for better performance

• Maintaining visual consistency across shared components


How to Use:

1. Select any frame or group you want to flatten

2. Run FlatMagic

3. Click 'Flatten Selection'

4. Done! Your flattened frame is ready to use


Made with ❤️ by Opeyemi Ajagbe

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Flatten layers instantly

117355.release_notes:
# FlatMagic v1.4.0 Release Notes

## 🚀 New Feature: Intelligent Quality Options

### Quality Selection Improvements
- Introduced dynamic quality option management for PNG exports
- Quality options now adapt based on frame dimensions
- Enhanced user experience with context-aware quality selections

### Key Changes
- For frames ≤ 1,200 x 1,200 pixels:
  - All quality options available (Default, High, Maximum)
- For frames > 1,200 x 1,200 pixels:
  - Only Default quality option available
- Default quality is now consistently set to 'Default'

### Benefits
- Prevents potential performance issues with large frames
- Provides clear, context-sensitive export options
- Maintains plugin stability across different frame sizes

## 🛠 Technical Improvements
- Refined UI initialization logic
- Improved event handling for quality option updates
- Enhanced test coverage for quality option scenarios

## Upgrade Recommendation
- Recommended for all users
- No breaking changes
- Improves overall export experience

plugins.name: Language Weaver
plugins.description:
Language Weaver machine translation enables global organizations to manage multilingual content and workflows in real-time at scale. Protect your data, accelerate insight and ignite growth through Language Weaver technologies.


With the Language Weaver plugin for Figma, you can quickly and securely translate text nodes and full pages of content in Figma. These features will speed up time to market by allowing design and development teams to autonomously collaborate across languages, perform multilingual localization testing and publish translated content directly from their native working environment.


The Language Weaver plugin for Figma supports Cloud and Edge and multiple forms of authentication, giving teams access to all of their available machine translation resources at their fingertips.


A Language Weaver contract is required to use this plugin. Contact us to find out how to get access.

accepted.name: RWS Group
accepted.description:
A unique, world-leading provider of
technology-enabled language, content and intellectual property services.

plugins.tagline: Enterprise-grade machine translation

plugins.name: Quicksubs
plugins.description:
✨ Welcome to Quicksubs! ✨


Quicksubs is a simple plugin that does one thing well: generate batches of PNG images from a template, replacing text content from a CSV.


Using Quicksubs is easy:

  1. Create your template, renaming your text nodes correctly
  2. Select the template frame and open Quicksubs
  3. Drag in your CSV
  4. Profit


See this link for full documentation and a How To guide.


--


Why Quicksubs: It was originally built for a YouTube channel that regularly needed 200+ subtitle overlays for their multi-lingual videos. Each subtitle frame instance contained 2 languages, each with separate fonts, and different text treatment. Figma seemed the perfect software to create the template, they just needed an efficient way to replace the text and export it hundreds of times.
